step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arms overhead and opening your fingers. Try to keep your elbows a little straighter in this position.
Excellent work making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together while inhaling. Your arm and shoulder movements are well-aligned with the instructions.
Great job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Your form here is very good, with minimal deviation.
You're doing well with the arm extension and relaxation. Focus on maintaining a consistent elbow position as you exhale.
Good effort on repeating the movement. Your shoulder and elbow alignment is improving with each repetition.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms extended overhead and your fingers open. Squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist and inhale.
